overview:
Veteran professional with strong analytical skills and a proven track record in online advertising. Research, analyze and evaluate trends and market data, identifying key factors to meet/exceed comprehensive marketing and revenue goals.

Specialties

AD OPERATIONS: Startup Development, Creativity, Employee Management, Strategic Planning, Building Scalable Business;

INDUSTRY SPECIFIC: Online Display Advertising, Optimization, Real Time Bidding (RTB), Ad Exchanges (Right Media Exchange, Google ADEX 2.0, AdMeld, Rubicon), Performance at Scale; Real Time Looklikes (RTLALs), Ad Networks, Video Advertising
